item.description:
This years scavenger hunt will take place in Plymouth.

We will be dividing into teams and using our cars instead of our motorcycles.

Solve clues and find the objects on the list for a great day of fun and comraderie!.

Digital cameras are required for each team as you will have to take pictures of your team at each location.

We will gather after the hunt and take a look at everyone's pictures and determine a winner.


Prizes for the winners !!!!!!


Meeting location: Diane and Sully's House
262R Court St (RT 3A) in Plymouth (*small house behind the big yellow house)

Meeting time: 930 am

Stop on the way for your coffee and donuts and bring to their house!!!!

Also: if you want some sort of alcohol to drink after the hunt with your Pizza, either bring it with you in the am and store in their refrig, or buy alcohol or whatever you want to drink on your way back to their house after the hunt!


From there we will divide into teams and head off on the hunt!

Please bring cameras!!!!!!!!

The teams will meet back at Diane and Sully's house to view the pictures, tally the points and eat Pizza. ($5 each to cover cost of food- Bring your own alcohol or drinks)

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: 2nd Annual Scavenger Hunt
